name: Satyr
description: Satyrs are fey creatures with a reputation for being fun-loving and hedonistic, but they are also known for their bravery and loyalty to their friends.

traits.name: Ability Score Increase
traits.description: Your Charisma score increases by 2, and your Dexterity score increases by 1.

traits.name: Speed
traits.description: Your base walking speed is 35 feet.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.description: You have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

effects.condition: against spells and other magical effects

traits.name: Ram
traits.description: You can use your head and horns to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier.

traits.name: Mirthful Leaps
traits.description: Whenever you make a long or high jump, you can roll a d8 and add the number rolled to the number of feet you cover, even when making a standing jump.

traits.name: Reveler
traits.description: You have proficiency in the Performance and Persuasion skills, and you have proficiency with one musical instrument of your choice.
